issue.title: [Docs][Java] javadoc failing on flight-integration-tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17787](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17787). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Observed on master
